title: Button, late 18th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Three octagonal mounts in the style of Wedgwood Jasperware; A, B) ornamented with a nude figure; C) with a draped figure leaning on a pedestal; white on blue ground.

On card 4

tombstone.epitaph:
Button, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Stoneware. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-27-a/c.
